#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

const int N=1005;
char a[N],b[N];
int dp[N][N];
int rec(int i ,int j) {
    if(i<0 || j<0) {
        return 0;
    }
    if(dp[i][j]!=-1)
        return dp[i][j];
     if(a[i]==b[j]) {
        return dp[i][j]=1+rec(i-1,j-1);
     }
     return dp[i][j]=max(rec(i-1,j),rec(i,j-1));
}
int main() {
    int t;cin>>t;
    int cs=0;
    while(t--) {
        memset(dp,-1,sizeof(dp));
        int n,m;cin>>n>>m;
        scanf("%s%s",a,b);
        printf("Case %d: ",++cs);
        cout<<m+n-rec(n-1,m-1)<<endl;
    }
}
